title: Hello! Aichi!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>We’ve arrived! Aichi! Ai-san came to see Aichi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hahaha, you’re so pumped, aren’t you, Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Are you planning to keep this level of energy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>This is just her usual self! Right, Ai-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aye, aye!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>This is tiring...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hey, before we head to the venue, there’s something I want to eat... It’s toast with butter and red bean paste on top...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That sounds great! Let’s fuel up before the event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I agree.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright! Let’s go get some red bean butter toast!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
